page.title: 06The Churches Of Highworth.
page.content:
In Highworth we have three main churches : St.Michael's (Church of England ),Methodist and United Reformed . St Michael's average congregation is about 50-80, their services are on Sunday 800am and 600pm. The Catholics use St Michael's on Sunday. The Methodist average congregation is 50-80.The service on Sunday is from 1030am to 11am.They have two clubs, Juco's and Coveys. The United Reformed Church has services on Sunday at 10am,6pm,and 830pm.The average congregation is 25-30. It has two clubs, one every Friday for children, one for adults every month.It used to have a bell but it was taken down.
.
